item.title: Funny
item.description: some funny code 记录有趣的代码 记录灵性的想法 记录王多鱼的投资项目(这个项目王多鱼必定投资,手动狗头!) 一、 import cv2 from cv2 import VideoWriter, VideoWriter_fourcc, imread, resize import os from subprocess import call img_root = '/Users/jiangxiaofan/Downloads/image/' out_root = '/Users/jiangxiaofan/Downloads/image/PeppaPig.avi' fps = 30 #帧率 size = (1280,720) fourcc = VideoWriter_fourcc(*"MJPG") #支持jpg videoWriter = cv2.VideoWriter(out_root, fourcc, fps, size) im_names = os.listdir(img_root) print(len(im_names)) for im_name in range(len(im_names) - 2): string = img_root + 'frame' + str(im_name) + '.jpg' print(string) frame = cv2.
